name: Foxtrade
description:
This game prototype was created as/during my university Thesis. It is free to enjoy, code can be found on github.

You can travel on the world map freely and trade with various NPC's.
You may progress on the main story visual novel style when you fulfill certain requirements.

https://github.com/raddanfea/foxtradeGame
Contains assets with non-commercial licenses. Everything should be credited properly, if not please notify me.
